title: Whirlpool CEO on State of Manufacturing
itunes:title: Whirlpool CEO on State of Manufacturing
description:
Marc Bitzer, CEO at Whirlpool, discusses earnings and adopting a "global world class manufacturing production system."

Hosts: Carol Massar and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
